ApplyChorus.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: yinsuda.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ApplyChorus
<公共请求参数>

{
    "UserId": "20220123abc",
    "AppName": "test",
    "RoomId": "100832",
    "MusicId": "mid-112ddff",
    "ChorusUserIds": [
        "user1",
        "user2"
    ],
    "MaxChorusNum": 10
}
ApplyChorus.title: 申请合唱
